t: Josh Schwartz & Stephanie Savage Strike First-Look Deal With Amazon; Barneys New York Drama In The Works With Susan Rovner As EP
s: 2 weeks ago - Barneys was a New York institution; a high-end department store that was founded in 1923. After being acquired by Authentic Brands Group, it closed its brick-and-mortars stores but remained as a brand, particularly as a partnership with Saks Fifth Avenue as well as its own beauty line.
